text: 17|71|ovvoru manitanaiyum avarkalin talaivarkalutan (vicaranaikkaka) nam alaikkum nalil, avarkalin (tinacari kurippup) puttakam avarkalutaiya valatu kaiyil kotukkappattal avarkal tankal (ate tinacari kurippup) puttakattai (mikka makilcciyotu) vacipparkal. (Avarkalutaiya kuliyil) or nul alavu (kuraittu)m aniyayam ceyyappatamattarkal
